Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Potion = Tool.Handle
Tool.Enabled = true local vCharacter = Tool.Parent
local insertTable = {} local headTable = {} local torsoTable = {}
local headColor
local co
local biteSound
local hunkActive = Tool:FindFirstChild("HunkActive")
-- get hunk hunkLeftArm = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(32336182) hunkLeftLeg = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(32336243) hunkRightArm = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(32336117) hunkRightLeg = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(32336306) hunkTorso = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(32336059)
hunkFace = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(27171262)
hunkShirt = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(53062494) hunkPants = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(53062825) hunkGlass = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(51245241)
hunkHead = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(6340213)
if hunkLeftArm then hunkLeftArm = hunkLeftArm:GetChildren() hunkLeftArm = hunkLeftArm[1] end if hunkRightArm then hunkRightArm = hunkRightArm:GetChildren() hunkRightArm = hunkRightArm[1] end if hunkLeftLeg then hunkLeftLeg = hunkLeftLeg:GetChildren() hunkLeftLeg = hunkLeftLeg[1] end if hunkRightLeg then hunkRightLeg = hunkRightLeg:GetChildren() hunkRightLeg = hunkRightLeg[1] end if hunkTorso then hunkTorso = hunkTorso:GetChildren() hunkTorso = hunkTorso[1] end if hunkFace then hunkFace = hunkFace:GetChildren() hunkFace = hunkFace[1] hunkFace.Handle.Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1.2, 1.2, 1.2) end if hunkShirt then hunkShirt = hunkShirt:GetChildren() hunkShirt = hunkShirt[1] end if hunkPants then hunkPants = hunkPants:GetChildren() hunkPants = hunkPants[1] end if hunkGlass then hunkGlass = hunkGlass:GetChildren() hunkGlass = hunkGlass[1] hunkGlass.Handle.Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1.1, 1.1, 1.1) end if hunkHead then hunkHead = hunkHead:GetChildren() hunkHead = hunkHead[1] end
--
-- Wait until Tool is picked up or equipped by Character while vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") == nil do wait() vCharacter = Tool.Parent end
charChildren = vCharacter:GetChildren() for c = 1, #charChildren do if charChildren[c].className ~= "Part" and charChildren[c].className ~= "Script" and charChildren[c].className ~= "LocalScript" and charChildren[c].className ~= "Humanoid" and charChildren[c].className ~= "Tool" and charChildren[c].className ~= "ForceField" then clone = charChildren[c]:Clone() table.insert(insertTable, clone) end if charChildren[c].Name == "Head" then headChildren = charChildren[c]:GetChildren() for a =1, #headChildren do if headChildren[a].className == "Decal" or headChildren[a].Name == "Mesh" then clone = headChildren[a]:Clone() table.insert(headTable, clone) end end end if charChildren[c].Name == "Torso" then torsoChildren = charChildren[c]:GetChildren() for x=1, #torsoChildren do if torsoChildren[x].className == "Decal" then clone = torsoChildren[x]:Clone() table.insert(torsoTable, clone) end end end end
function onActivated()
if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
biteSound = Tool:FindFirstChild("BiteSound")
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid == nil then return end
head = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Head") if head == nil then return end
headColor = head.BrickColor
if biteSound then biteSound:Play() end
graphics = vCharacter:GetChildren() for j = 1, #graphics do if graphics[j].className ~= "Part" and graphics[j].className ~= "Script" and graphics[j].className ~= "LocalScript" and graphics[j].className ~= "Humanoid" and graphics[j].className ~= "Tool" and graphics[j].className ~= "ForceField" then graphics[j]:Remove() end if graphics[j].Name == "Head" then headChildren = graphics[j]:GetChildren() for a = 1, #headChildren do if headChildren[a].Name == "Mesh" then headChildren[a]:Remove() end end end end
bLA = hunkLeftArm:Clone() bLA.Parent = vCharacter bLL = hunkLeftLeg:Clone() bLL.Parent = vCharacter bRA = hunkRightArm:Clone() bRA.Parent = vCharacter bRL = hunkRightLeg:Clone() bRL.Parent = vCharacter bT = hunkTorso:Clone() bT.Parent = vCharacter
bFace = hunkFace:Clone() bFace.Parent = vCharacter bShirt = hunkShirt:Clone() bShirt.Parent = vCharacter bPants = hunkPants:Clone() bPants.Parent = vCharacter bGlass = hunkGlass:Clone() bGlass.Parent = vCharacter
bHead = hunkHead:Clone() bHead.Parent = vCharacter.Head
head.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright orange")
if co == nil or coroutine.status(co) == 'dead' then print("Coroutine created") co = coroutine.create(reset) coroutine.resume(co) hunkActive.Value = 1 else print(coroutine.status(co)) -- do nothing end
Potion.Transparency = 1.0
if myHumanoid then myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 25 ratio = myHumanoid.Health/myHumanoid.MaxHealth myHumanoid.MaxHealth = 200 wait(0.2) myHumanoid.Health = ratio * 200 end
while hunkActive.Value == 1 do wait(1) end Tool.Enabled = true end
function reset() wait(45) hunkActive.Value = 0 Potion.Transparency = 0.0
myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid then myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 ratio = myHumanoid.Health/myHumanoid.MaxHealth myHumanoid.Health = ratio * 100 myHumanoid.MaxHealth = 100 end if insertTable ~= nil then if morphResetSound then morphResetSound:Play() end graphics = vCharacter:GetChildren() for j = 1, #graphics do if graphics[j].className ~= "Part" and graphics[j].className ~= "Script" and graphics[j].className ~= "LocalScript" and graphics[j].className ~= "Humanoid" and graphics[j].className ~= "Tool" then graphics[j]:Remove() end if graphics[j].Name == "Head" then headChildren = graphics[j]:GetChildren() for a = 1, #headChildren do if headChildren[a].Name == "Mesh" then headChildren[a]:Remove() end end end end for i =1, #insertTable do clone = insertTable[i]:Clone() clone.Parent = vCharacter end for i =1, #headTable do if headTable[i].Name == "Mesh" then clone = headTable[i]:Clone() clone.Parent = vCharacter.Head end end vCharacter.Head.BrickColor = headColor end end
function onEquipped() if hunkActive.Value == 1 then Potion.Transparency = 1.0 end end
function onUnequipped() --if hunkActive then hunkActive.Value = 0 end if Potion then Potion.Transparency = 0.0 end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
